#text=The easiest cake for me to make is Cheesecake .
#text=Throw eggs , sugar , cream cheese and flavor in a bowl and you have the filling .
#text=Pour that filling in a cookie crust , bake at 350 for one hour , remove and freeze .
#text=I slice up a few strawberries , pour sugar over them add a little and then place on top of frozen cheesecake .
#text=It is so good that your whole family will enjoy it .
#text=My love of cooking came from my mother .
#text=She used let me help her in the kitchen .
#text=When she made cakes and pies and used the mixer , she would let me lick the bowl .
#text=I would get frosting , cake batter and pie filling on my jaws and face .
#text=But I didn ' t care about that .
#text=Those times were the few times that my siblings and I didn� � t complain about cleaning up the kitchen .
#text=I wish I could have a day like one of those days just once again .
